TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SocketAsyncEventArgs extends System.EventArgs implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class SocketAsyncEventArgs Inherits EventArgs Implements IDisposable
public ref class SocketAsyncEventArgs : EventArgs, IDisposable

summary.span: 代表非同步通訊端作業。

span.span: Represents an asynchronous socket operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是一組增強功能的一部分提供可供專業化的高效能通訊端應用程式的另一種非同步模式的類別。The class is part of a set of enhancements to the class that provide an alternative asynchronous pattern that can be used by specialized high-performance socket applications. 這個類別被專為需要高效能的網路伺服器應用程式。This class was specifically designed for network server applications that require high performance. 應用程式可以只使用增強的非同步模式，或只在目標區域 （例如，接收大量的資料時）。An application can use the enhanced asynchronous pattern exclusively or only in targeted hot areas (for example, when receiving large amounts of data). 這些增強功能的主要功能是在大量的非同步通訊端 I/O 期間，避免重複配置和同步處理物件。The main feature of these enhancements is the avoidance of the repeated allocation and synchronization of objects during high-volume asynchronous socket I/O. 目前所實作的 Begin/End 設計模式類別會要求即將配置給每個非同步通訊端作業的物件。The Begin/End design pattern currently implemented by the class requires a object be allocated for each asynchronous socket operation. 在新類別增強功能，作業會描述可重複使用的非同步通訊端物件配置和維護的應用程式。In the new class enhancements, asynchronous socket operations are described by reusable objects allocated and maintained by the application. 高效能通訊端應用程式最知道必須維持的重疊通訊端作業量。High-performance socket applications know best the amount of overlapped socket operations that must be sustained. 應用程式可以視需要建立許多 物件。The application can create as many of the objects that it needs. 例如，如果伺服器應用程式需要 15 通訊端接受作業未完成隨時支援內送的用戶端連線比率，它可以配置可重複使用 15用於此用途的物件。For example, if a server application needs to have 15 socket accept operations outstanding at all times to support incoming client connection rates, it can allocate 15 reusable objects for that purpose. 以這個類別執行非同步通訊端作業的模式，包含下列步驟：The pattern for performing an asynchronous socket operation with this class consists of the following steps: 1. 配置新 內容物件，或從應用程式集區取得一個可用的內容物件。Allocate a new context object, or get a free one from an application pool. 2. 在內容上的設定屬性的物件作業有關要執行 （完成回呼方法、 資料緩衝區，緩衝區，而且要傳送，例如資料的最大數量的位移）。Set properties on the context object to the operation about to be performed (the completion callback method, the data buffer, the offset into the buffer, and the maximum amount of data to transfer, for example). 3. 呼叫適當的通訊端方法 (xxxAsync) 來啟始非同步作業。Call the appropriate socket method (xxxAsync) to initiate the asynchronous operation. 4. 如果非同步通訊端方法 (xxxAsync) 會傳回 true，回呼中，查詢完成狀態的內容屬性。If the asynchronous socket method (xxxAsync) returns true, in the callback, query the context properties for completion status. 5. 如果非同步通訊端方法 (xxxAsync) 會傳回 false，以同步方式完成作業。If the asynchronous socket method (xxxAsync) returns false, the operation completed synchronously. 可以查詢內容屬性以取得作業結果。The context properties may be queried for the operation result. 6. 重複使用內容進行另一個作業、將它放入集區，或是將它捨棄。Reuse the context for another operation, put it back in the pool, or discard it. 新的非同步通訊端作業內容物件的存留期取決於所參考的應用程式程式碼和非同步 I/O 的參考。The lifetime of the new asynchronous socket operation context object is determined by references by the application code and asynchronous I/O references. 應用程式不需要在送出作為其中一個非同步通訊端作業方法的參數之後，保留對非同步通訊端作業內容物件的參考。It is not necessary for the application to retain a reference to an asynchronous socket operation context object after it is submitted as a parameter to one of the asynchronous socket operation methods. 在完成回呼傳回之前，它會一直被參考。It will remain referenced until the completion callback returns. 不過它的好處是保留內容的參考，如此就可以為未來的非同步通訊端作業重複使用的應用程式。However it is advantageous for the application to retain the reference to the context so that it can be reused for a future asynchronous socket operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作使用的通訊端伺服器的連線邏輯類別。The following code example implements the connection logic for the socket server that uses the class. 接受連接之後, 從用戶端讀取所有資料會都傳送回用戶端。After accepting a connection, all data read from the client is sent back to the client. 讀取和回用戶端模式會繼續，直到用戶端中斷連線為止。The read and echo back to the client pattern is continued until the client disconnects. 中的程式碼範例會顯示這個範例會使用 BufferManager 類別方法。The BufferManager class that is used by this example is displayed in the code example for the method. 中的程式碼範例會顯示用在此範例中的 SocketAsyncEventArgsPool 類別建構函式。The SocketAsyncEventArgsPool class that is used in this example is displayed in the code example for the constructor. [!code-csharp[NCLAsyncSocketServer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAsyncSocketServer/CS/AsyncSocketServer.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建立空的 執行個體。

span.span: Creates an empty instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個建構函式之後，所有屬性都會都有其預設值：After calling this constructor all properties will have their default values: - 物件參考將會是 nullObject references will be null - 屬性會傳回整數，會傳回零。Properties that return an integer will return zero. - 屬性將會等於。The property will be equal to . - 屬性將會等於，指定沒有旗標將會使用。The property will be equal to , which specifies no flags will be used. - 屬性將會等於。The property will be equal to . 呼叫端必須設定適當的屬性之前將物件傳遞至適當的非同步通訊端 (xxxAsync) 方法。The caller must set the appropriate properties prior to passing the object to the appropriate asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例代表集合的可重複使用物件。The following code example represents a collection of reusable objects. [!code-csharp[NCLAsyncSocketServer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAsyncSocketServer/CS/AsyncSocketServer.cs#2)]

span.span: The platform is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Sockets::Socket ^ AcceptSocket { System::Net::Sockets::Socket ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Sockets::Socket ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要使用的通訊端，或是已建立並且使用非同步通訊端方法接受連線的通訊端。

span.span: Gets or sets the socket to use or the socket created for accepting a connection with an asynchronous socket method.

value.span: 要使用的 ，或是已建立並且使用非同步通訊端方法接受連線的通訊端。

span.span: The to use or the socket created for accepting a connection with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以用來提供已建立，將使用的非同步通訊端接受作業。This property can be used to provide an already created that will be used for an asynchronous socket accept operation. 完成接受作業的詳細資訊，則表示已接受的連線通訊端。Upon completion of the accept operation, it is the socket representing the accepted connection. 如果未提供 （設定為 null），然後再呼叫方法，新的通訊端將會自動建立和完成回呼，這個屬性可以存取。If not supplied (set to null) before calling the method, a new socket will be created automatically and be accessible in the completion callback with this property.

span.span: Gets the data buffer to use with an asynchronous socket method.

value.span: 陣列，表示要和非同步通訊端方法一起使用的資料緩衝區。

span.span: A array that represents the data buffer to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會取得目前與相關聯的資料緩衝區執行個體。This property gets the data buffer currently associated with the instance. 若要設定緩衝區，必須使用的方法。To set the buffer, the method must be used. 這個屬性搭配， ， ， ， ， ，和方法。This property is used with the , , , , , , and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property BufferList As IList(Of ArraySegment(Of Byte))

public: property System::Collections::Generic::IList<ArraySegment<System::Byte>> ^ BufferList { System::Collections::Generic::IList<ArraySegment<System::Byte>> ^ get(); void set(System::Collections::Generic::IList<ArraySegment<System::Byte>> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要和非同步通訊端方法一起使用的資料緩衝區之陣列。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of data buffers to use with an asynchronous socket method.

value.span: ，表示要和非同步通訊端方法一起使用的資料緩衝區之陣列。

span.span: An that represents an array of data buffers to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性搭配和方法。This property is used with the and methods. 這個屬性用來提供多個緩衝區的資料傳送，或是提供多個緩衝區，用來儲存資料的非同步通訊端作業，可以傳送或接收資料。This property is used to provide multiple buffers of data to be sent or to provide multiple buffers in which to store received data for an asynchronous socket operation that can send or receive data. 使用多個緩衝區屬性受到和方法。Multiple buffers using the property are supported by the and methods. 如果屬性設定為非 null 值，屬性必須是 null，而且會忽略和方法。If the property is set to a non-null value, the property must be null and is ignored by the and methods. 如果已設為非 null 值，並嘗試設定屬性設為非 null 值，會發生例外狀況。If the was set to a non-null value and an attempt is made to set the property to a non-null value, an exception is thrown. 如果屬性設定為非 null 值，和方法會擲回。If the property is set to a non-null value, the and methods will throw an . 參數已忽略由和方法。The parameter is ignored by the and methods.

exception.span: Set 作業指定了不明確的緩衝區。

span.span: There are ambiguous buffers specified on a set operation.

exception.span: 如果 屬性設定成非 Null 值，且嘗試將 屬性設定為非 Null 值，就會發生這個例外狀況。

span.span: This exception occurs if the property has been set to a non-null value and an attempt was made to set the property to a non-null value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BytesTransferred As Integer
public: property int BytesTransferred { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得通訊端作業中所傳輸的位元組數目。

span.span: Gets the number of bytes transferred in the socket operation.

value.span: ，內含通訊端作業中所傳輸的位元組數目。

span.span: An that contains the number of bytes transferred in the socket operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性提供傳輸中的非同步通訊端作業可以接收或傳送資料位元組的數目。This property provides the number of bytes transferred in an asynchronous socket operation that can receive or send data. 如果讀取作業傳回零，則遠端端點已經關閉連接。If zero is returned from a read operation, the remote end has closed the connection. 這個屬性由不含所有的非同步通訊端作業設定方法。This property is set by all asynchronous socket operations except the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Completed As EventHandler(Of SocketAsyncEventArgs)

summary.span: 用來完成非同步作業的事件。

span.span: The event used to complete an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓用戶端應用程式來完成非同步通訊端作業。The event provides a way for client applications to complete an asynchronous socket operation. 事件處理常式應該附加至事件內非同步通訊端作業啟動時，執行個體，否則應用程式將無法以判斷完成作業。An event handler should be attached to the event within a instance when an asynchronous socket operation is initiated, otherwise the application will not be able to determine when the operation completes. 完成回呼委派，參考事件包含程式邏輯，以完成處理用戶端的非同步通訊端作業。The completion callback delegates referenced by the event contains program logic to finish processing the asynchronous socket operation for the client. 當事件發出信號時，應用程式會使用物件參數來取得已完成的非同步通訊端作業的狀態。When the event is signaled, the application uses the object parameter to obtain the status of the completed asynchronous socket operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectByNameError As Exception
public: property Exception ^ ConnectByNameError { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用 時發生連接失敗的例外狀況 (Exception)。

span.span: Gets the exception in the case of a connection failure when a was used.

value.span: ，指出當指定 屬性的 條件下發生連接錯誤的原因。

span.span: An that indicates the cause of the connection error when a was specified for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果發生連接失敗時指定屬性，屬性會包含指出詳細的通訊端錯誤原因的例外狀況。In the case of a connection failure when a was specified for the property, the property will contain the exception that indicates the detailed cause of the socket error. 當指定屬性和連線失敗，就會發生，屬性會是`null`參考。When an was specified for the property and a connection failure occurs, the property will be a `null` reference. 屬性永遠會設定在連線失敗的情況下。The property is always set in the case of a connection failure. 屬性包含有關失敗的詳細資訊，如果它無法連接到。The property contains more information about the failure if it was a failure connecting to a . 如果只想要應用程式連線作業是否成功或失敗，則應用程式只需要檢查屬性。If an application is only interested in whether the connect operation succeeded or failed, then the application only needs to check the property.

span.span: The created and connected object after successful completion of the method.

value.span: 連接的 物件。

span.span: The connected object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性由呼叫設定方法。This property is set by calling the method. 這個屬性搭配， ， ， ， ， ，和方法。This property is used with the , , , , , , and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisconnectReuseSocket { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定在中斷連接作業後是否可以重複使用通訊端。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies if socket can be reused after a disconnect operation.

value.span: ，指定在中斷連接作業後是否可以重複使用通訊端。

span.span: A that specifies if socket can be reused after a disconnect operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來改變行為方法。This property is used to alter the behavior of method. 如果為 true，通訊端中斷方法可以重複使用之後中斷連線完成後續的通訊端在接受或連線作業。If true, a socket disconnected by the method can be reused after disconnect completion in subsequent socket accept or connect operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 執行個體所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地處置 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the instance and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的資源。

span.span: Frees resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別完成項關閉以及釋放相關聯的資源。The class finalizer closes the and free resources associated with the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastOperation As SocketAsyncOperation

summary.span: 取得最近使用這個內容物件執行的通訊端作業類型。

span.span: Gets the type of socket operation most recently performed with this context object.

value.span: 執行個體，代表最近使用這個內容物件執行的通訊端作業類型。

span.span: A instance that indicates the type of socket operation most recently performed with this context object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性描述最近使用這個完成的非同步通訊端作業物件。This property describes the asynchronous socket operation that was most recently completed using this object. 這個屬性的值將會是直到執行個體做為開頭的非同步通訊端作業。The value of this property will be until the instance is used to begin an asynchronous socket operation. 這個屬性然後將設定的作業正在執行中方法會採用型別做為參數。The property will then be set to the type of operation being performed in the methods that take the as a parameter. 這個屬性會可更容易使用多個類型的非同步通訊端作業的單一完成回呼委派。This property more easily facilitates using a single completion callback delegate for multiple kinds of asynchronous socket operations. 這個屬性就持續有效中執行個體，直到執行個體用於另一個非同步通訊端 (xxxAsync) 作業。This property remains valid in a instance until the instance is used for another asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) operation. 這個屬性是設定的所有非同步通訊端 (xxxAsync) 方法。This property is set by all asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods. 在呼叫非同步通訊端方法 (xxxAsync)類別會設定這個屬性值。Calling an asynchronous socket method (xxxAsync) on the class sets this property value. 這個屬性是用於與應用程式實作 SocketAsyncCallback 完成常式。This property is intended for use with the SocketAsyncCallback completion routine implemented by the application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCompleted(class System.Net.Sockets.SocketAsyncEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnCompleted (e As SocketAsyncEventArgs)

span.span: The event that is signaled.

summary.span: 代表在非同步作業完成時所呼叫的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that is called when an asynchronous operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是可由使用者程式碼呼叫。This method is not callable by user code. 取得呼叫這個方法的內部資訊物件目前的作業完成時。This method gets called by the internals of the object when the current operation is complete. 這個方法會用於所有的非同步通訊端 (xxxAsync) 方法。This method is used with all asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods. 建立繼承自一個類別的應用程式可以覆寫這個方法，以連線到這個完成的通知，並清除任何它的作業已配置的資源。An application that creates a class inheriting from can override this method to hook into this completion notification and clean up any resources that it allocated for the operation. 預設實作只會引發事件。The default implementation just raises the event. 這個方法用來攔截 (hook) 做為後續的非同步通訊端作業完成回呼的事件處理常式。This method is used to hook up an event handler to be used as the completion callback for a subsequent asynchronous socket operation. 呼叫者必須實作繼承自這個方法，再開始使用其中一種非同步 (xxxAsync) 方法的非同步通訊端作業至少一個回呼委派類別。The caller must implement at least one callback delegate inherited from this method prior to starting an asynchronous socket operation using one of the asynchronous (xxxAsync) methods on the class. 呼叫端的方法可讓用戶端應用程式來完成非同步通訊端作業。The caller's method provides a way for client applications to complete an asynchronous socket operation. 起始非同步通訊端作業時，就必須實作的回呼委派。A callback delegate must be implemented when an asynchronous socket operation is initiated. 完成回呼 delegate(s) 繼承自方法必須包含程式邏輯，以完成處理用戶端的非同步通訊端作業。The completion callback delegate(s) inherited from the method must contain program logic to finish processing the asynchronous socket operation for the client. 非同步作業會收到信號時，應用程式使用物件參數來取得已完成的非同步通訊端作業的狀態。When an asynchronous operation is signaled, the application uses the object parameter to obtain status of the completed asynchronous socket operation.

summary.span: 取得接收之封包的 IP 位址和介面。

span.span: Gets the IP address and interface of a received packet.

value.span: 執行個體，內含接收之封包的目的地 IP 位址和介面。

span.span: An instance that contains the destination IP address and interface of a received packet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供有關使用所接收的封包資訊方法。This property provides information about a packet received using the method. 這個屬性搭配方法。This property is used with the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定非同步作業的遠端 IP 端點。

span.span: Gets or sets the remote IP endpoint for an asynchronous operation.

value.span: ，表示非同步作業的遠端 IP 端點。

span.span: An that represents the remote IP endpoint for an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指定遠端端點。This property specifies the remote endpoint. 這個屬性可以指定要用來連接使用的遠端端點方法。This property can specify the remote endpoint to which to connect using the method. 這個屬性可以指定要使用的資料傳送至遠端端點方法。This property can specify the remote endpoint to which to send data using method. 這個屬性可以指定遠端端點從收到的資料使用或方法。This property can specify the remote endpoint from which data was received using the or methods. 這個屬性所指定的遠端端點可以包括 IPv4 或 IPv6 位址。This remote endpoint specified by this property can include an IPv4 or IPv6 address. 這個屬性搭配， ， ，或方法。This property is used with the , , , or methods.

summary.span: 取得或設定要為 方法所使用的非同步作業傳送的緩衝區陣列。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of buffers to be sent for an asynchronous operation used by the method.

value.span: 物件的陣列，表示要傳送的緩衝區之陣列。

span.span: An array of objects that represent an array of buffers to be sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在記憶體中的記憶體資料緩衝區一組檔案，可代表緩衝區的陣列。The array of buffers can represent a file or files in memory or a set of memory data buffers. 這個屬性搭配方法。This property is used with the method.

span.span: Gets or sets a bitwise combination of values for an asynchronous operation used by the method.

value.span: ，內含要和非同步作業一起使用的值位元組合。

span.span: A that contains a bitwise combination of values that are used with an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定，由方法。This property specifies the that are used by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SendPacketsSendSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定傳送作業中所使用的資料區塊大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the data block used in the send operation.

value.span: ，內含傳送作業中所使用的資料區塊大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: An that contains the size, in bytes, of the data block used in the send operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設為零，可讓通訊端層，選取預設的傳送大小。Set this property to zero to let the sockets layer select a default send size. 將此屬性設定為 0xFFFFFFFF 可讓呼叫端控制的大小和每個傳送要求的內容，方法是使用屬性。Setting this property to 0xFFFFFFFF enables the caller to control the size and content of each send request, achieved by using the property. 這項功能可用於會個別傳送要求的大小限制的訊息通訊協定。This capability is useful for message protocols that place limitations on the size of individual send requests.

summary.span: 初始化要和非同步通訊端方法一起使用的資料緩衝區。

span.span: Initializes the data buffer to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會設定屬性設為 null 和和屬性為零。This method sets the property to null and the and properties to zero.

public: void SetBuffer(int offset, int count);

param.name: offset
param.span: 作業開始的資料緩衝區位移 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The offset, in bytes, in the data buffer where the operation starts.

param.name: count
param.span: 緩衝區中要傳送或接收的資料量上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The maximum amount of data, in bytes, to send or receive in the buffer.

summary.span: 設定要和非同步通訊端方法一起使用的資料緩衝區。

span.span: Sets the data buffer to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `offset`和`count`參數不可為負數。The `offset` and `count` parameters can't be negative numbers. 組合`offset`和`count`參數必須在範圍中的緩衝區陣列屬性。The combination of the `offset` and `count` parameters must be in bounds of the buffer array in the property. 這個方法會設定屬性`count`參數和屬性`offset`參數。This method sets the property to the `count` parameter and the property to the `offset` parameter. 如果屬性為 null，則這個方法會忽略`offset`和`count`參數和集合和屬性設定為 0。If the property is null, this method ignores the `offset` and `count` parameters and sets the and properties to 0. 這個方法不會變更屬性。This method does not change the property.

span.span: An argument was out of range.

exception.span: 如果 參數小於零或大於 屬性中的陣列長度，就會發生這個例外狀況。

span.span: This exception occurs if the parameter is less than zero or greater than the length of the array in the property.

exception.span: 如果 參數小於零或大於 屬性中的陣列長度減去 參數，也會發生這個例外狀況。

span.span: This exception also occurs if the parameter is less than zero or greater than the length of the array in the property minus the parameter.

public: void SetBuffer(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要和非同步通訊端方法一起使用的資料緩衝區。

span.span: The data buffer to use with an asynchronous socket method.

param.name: offset
param.span: 作業開始的資料緩衝區位移 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The offset, in bytes, in the data buffer where the operation starts.

param.name: count
param.span: 緩衝區中要傳送或接收的資料量上限 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The maximum amount of data, in bytes, to send or receive in the buffer.

summary.span: 設定要和非同步通訊端方法一起使用的資料緩衝區。

span.span: Sets the data buffer to use with an asynchronous socket method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `offset`和`count`參數不可為負數。The `offset` and `count` parameters can't be negative numbers. 組合`offset`和`count`參數必須是在中的資料陣列的界限內`buffer`參數。The combination of the `offset` and `count` parameters must be in bounds of the data array in the `buffer` parameter. 這個方法會設定 [SetBuffer 方法 (位元組\ 屬性來`buffer`參數時，[SetBuffer 方法 (位元組\ 屬性來`count`參數，而 [SetBuffer 方法 (位元組\ 屬性來`offset`參數。This method sets the [SetBuffer Method (Byte\ property to the `buffer` parameter, the [SetBuffer Method (Byte\ property to the `count` parameter, and the [SetBuffer Method (Byte\ property to the `offset` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立單一大型緩衝區，它可以分割並指派給 [SetBuffer 方法 (位元組\ 物件使用與每個通訊端的 I/O 作業。The following code example creates a single large buffer which can be divided up and assigned to [SetBuffer Method (Byte\ objects for use with each socket I/O operation. 這可用來輕易地重複使用緩衝區，並防範分割堆積記憶體。This enables buffers to be easily reused and guards against fragmenting heap memory. [!code-csharp[NCLAsyncSocketServer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLAsyncSocketServer/CS/AsyncSocketServer.cs#1)]

span.span: This exception occurs if the property is also not null and the property is also not null.
An argument was out of range.

summary.span: 取得或設定非同步通訊端作業的結果。

span.span: Gets or sets the result of the asynchronous socket operation.

value.span: ，表示非同步通訊端作業的結果。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性提供非同步通訊端作業的完成狀態。This property provides the completion status of an asynchronous socket operation. 值為指出作業成功完成。A value of indicates successful completion of an operation. 這個屬性主要用於應用程式的事件處理常式。This property is primarily used in an application’s event handler routine. 這個屬性適用於所有的非同步通訊端 (xxxAsync) 方法。This property is used with all of the asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ UserToken { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與這個非同步通訊端作業相關聯的使用者或應用程式物件。

span.span: Gets or sets a user or application object associated with this asynchronous socket operation.

value.span: 物件，表示與這個非同步通訊端作業相關聯的使用者或應用程式物件。

span.span: An object that represents the user or application object associated with this asynchronous socket operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以由應用程式用來與應用程式狀態物件關聯物件。This property can be used by an application to associate an application state object with the object. 主要是這個屬性是方法，讓應用程式傳遞至應用程式的事件處理常式 （例如，非同步作業完成方法） 的狀態。Primarily, this property is a way for an application to pass state to the application’s event handler (for example, the asynchronous operation completion method). 這個屬性適用於所有的非同步通訊端 (xxxAsync) 方法。This property is used with all of the asynchronous socket (xxxAsync) methods.
